Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Phase 3 Task 2: Complete Role-Based Access Control (RBAC) Implementation (v2.13.0)

MAJOR ACHIEVEMENT: Phase 3 Task 2 successfully implemented with all role-based authorization components.

Key Accomplishments:
âœ… Task 1 - RoleAuthorizationMiddleware: HTTP request logging with full audit trail
âœ… Task 2 - AuthorizationPolicyProvider: Dynamic policy creation with 10 predefined policies
âœ… Task 3 - AuthorizationAttributes: 11 specialized authorization attributes for easy endpoint protection
âœ… Task 4 - Program.cs: Authorization service registration and middleware pipeline setup
âœ… Task 5 - Build verification: ZERO compilation errors, 65 non-critical warnings

Files Created: 3 new files (712 lines)
- RoleAuthorizationMiddleware.cs (120 lines) - Request logging and authorization auditing
- AuthorizationPolicyProvider.cs (280 lines) - Dynamic policy provider with 10 policies
- AuthorizationAttributes.cs (300 lines) - 11 specialized role-based attributes

Files Modified: 1 file (Program.cs - 12 lines added)
- Added authorization service configuration
- Added role authorization middleware to pipeline
- Added necessary imports for authorization

Authorization Features Implemented:
âœ… Policy-Based Authorization: [Authorize(Policy = "ManagementTeam")]
âœ… Attribute-Based Authorization: [RequireTraderRole], [RequireSettlementRole], etc.
âœ… Role-Based Authorization: [Authorize(Roles = "Trader,Manager")]
âœ… Comprehensive Audit Logging: User ID, email, roles, IP address, method, path
âœ… Dynamic Policy Support: New policies created on-demand without code changes
âœ… Non-Blocking Middleware: Invalid tokens continue to next middleware for proper error handling
âœ… 18-Role Support: Leverages existing UserRole enum (SystemAdmin, Trader, Manager, etc.)

Predefined Authorization Policies (10 total):
1. AdminOnly - SystemAdmin only
2. ManagementTeam - Leadership access (SystemAdmin, TradingManager, SettlementManager, FinanceManager)
3. TradersAndAbove - Trading operations (SystemAdmin, TradingManager, SeniorTrader, Trader)
4. OperationsTeam - Logistics (SystemAdmin, OperationsManager, OperationsClerk)
5. SettlementTeam - Settlement ops (SystemAdmin, SettlementManager, SettlementClerk)
6. FinanceTeam - Financial data (SystemAdmin, FinanceManager, FinanceClerk)
7. RiskTeam - Risk analysis (SystemAdmin, RiskManager, RiskAnalyst)
8. InventoryTeam - Inventory mgmt (SystemAdmin, InventoryManager, InventoryClerk)
9. ComplianceTeam - Compliance (SystemAdmin, ComplianceOfficer, Auditor)
10. ReadOnlyAccess - Report viewers (all roles except Guest)

Specialized Authorization Attributes (11 total):
1. [RequireAdminRole] - System administrators only
2. [RequireManagementRole] - Management team access
3. [RequireTraderRole] - Traders and above
4. [RequireOperationsRole] - Operations team
5. [RequireSettlementRole] - Settlement team
6. [RequireRiskRole] - Risk management team
7. [RequireInventoryRole] - Inventory team
8. [RequireFinanceRole] - Finance team
9. [RequireComplianceRole] - Compliance team
10. [RequireAuthentication] - Any authenticated user
11. [AllowReadOnlyAccess] - Read-only users and above

Integration with Phase 3 Task 1 (JWT Authentication):
âœ… JWT tokens include Role claim from user.Role enum
âœ… RoleAuthorizationMiddleware reads roles from token claims
âœ… AuthorizationPolicyProvider validates role membership from claims
âœ… Complete end-to-end authentication â†’ authorization flow
âœ… No additional database queries needed (roles embedded in token)

Audit Trail Features:
âœ… All authorization attempts logged with timestamp (Serilog integration)
âœ… User identification captured (ID and email)
âœ… Client IP address recorded for security analysis
âœ… HTTP method and endpoint path included
âœ… Response status code logged
âœ… Role list displayed in each log entry
âœ… Log levels: DEBUG (success), INFO (request), WARNING (denied), ERROR (exception)

Security Best Practices Implemented:
âœ… Principle of Least Privilege - minimum required access per role
âœ… Non-Blocking Middleware - invalid tokens don''t cause failures, deferred to [Authorize]
âœ… Role Hierarchy - clear role-based access levels from Guest (18) to SystemAdmin (1)
âœ… Dynamic Policies - extensible design supports new policies without code changes
âœ… Fallback Mechanism - unknown policies return null, causing 403 Forbidden
âœ… Comprehensive Logging - complete audit trail for compliance and security analysis

Architecture Highlights:
- Middleware-based approach for logging all authorization attempts
- Policy provider pattern for dynamic policy resolution
- Attribute-based approach for simple endpoint protection
- Full integration with ASP.NET Core authorization framework
- Extensible design for custom authorization logic

Code Quality:
âœ… Full async/await pattern throughout
âœ… Comprehensive XML documentation
âœ… Consistent naming conventions
âœ… Proper dependency injection
âœ… Error handling best practices
âœ… Logging integration at all levels

Build Status: âœ… ZERO ERRORS

- All 8 projects compiled successfully
- 65 non-critical warnings (all pre-existing)
- Zero new issues introduced
